title: Server attacks
extract: An attacker may cause a denial of service attack by sending numerous service request packets overwhelming the servicing capability of the web server, or he may try to exploit a programming error in the application causing a DOS attack. E.g. buffer overflow attack, SYN flooding, HTTP get Request Flooding, Ping of death.
extract_html: An attacker may cause a denial of service attack by sending numerous service request packets overwhelming the servicing capability of the web server, or he may try to exploit a programming error in the application causing a DOS attack. E.g. buffer overflow attack, SYN flooding, HTTP get Request Flooding, Ping of death.
